content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price during the conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If we had agreed on a final price, it would be 900 Euro per month, as that is the price I mentioned that reflects the market value and the amenities of the apartment. However, since we did not reach an agreement, there is no exact number to provide.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As Peter Schmidt, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Haoyu Wang, as an 8 out of 10. He was polite, honest, and demonstrated a clear desire to find a fair deal, which are all qualities I appreciate in a negotiation partner.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation. Mr. Wang was respectful and professional throughout our conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: As Peter Schmidt, I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation with Mr. Wang. If I had felt that way, it would have been due to his insistence on a price that was significantly lower than the market value of the apartment, which could be perceived as an attempt to take advantage of me as a landlord. However, Mr. Wang's approach was reasonable and based on his financial situation as a student, which I understood and respected.
name: Peter Schmidt
